Package task

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Client
    This class is responsible for client side of chatting application.
    ClientSideHandler
    this class handles the client side of the application it ensures that messages are sent out to every single connected client
    Echoer
    This class is responsible for echoing messages sent to all clients that are connected to server If the exit condition is met it disconnects the client and shows information on application
    Server
    This application implements chatting app using sockets Server utilizes Echoer which is responsible for sending message to all of the connected clients Class has member that is ArrayList of type Echoer to keep track of all clients
